body.name: 5G WiFi Portable Video Projector, 1080P HD Projector 9000L Mini Projector with Tripod, Outdoor Movie Projector Supported Compatible with Bluetooth / WIFI / USB / SD Card
features: [Experience Stunning HD Quality] With native 1080P full HD resolution and 10000:1 contrast ratio, this movie projector provides vivid and sharp HD images that will take your viewing experience to the next level.

[Fast and Stable Wireless Connectivity] Thanks to 5G and 2.4G Dual-Band WiFi function, the projector with WiFi and Bluetooth enjoys a faster wireless speed, wider range, and smoother transmission than other 2.4G single-band projectors. Within 5 seconds it gets connected successfully. With the help of 5.1 Bluetooth chip you can connect the projector with the Bluetooth speaker to improve sound at a party or outdoor entertainment as it offers a stable and fast speed.

[Zoom Function and Loud Speakers] For you to enjoy the 50 - 150 inches large screen easily, this Bluetooth projector contains 100%-50% zoom function. Without any external speakers, you can enjoy great stereo with the help of built-in 3W dual stereo speakers with an SRS sound system.

[Multiple Interfaces and Compatibility] The WiFi projector makes your home electronic devices more dynamic and useful and it is compatible with iPhone, Android phone, tablet, USB Drive, external speaker, earphone, etc. As it contains multiple ports like USB, Audio, AV, and TF card ports.

[Portable and Versatile] This outdoor projector is only 1.6lb, it’s portable and can be carried anywhere like the yard, garden, garage, RVs, camping, etc. A portable power station can power the video projector easily if you are using it outdoors. It is ideal for online classes, yoga exercises, and assisting tailors and painters in creating artwork.

productInformation.value: ‎5G WiFi, USB, Bluetooth, Built-in Speaker, Portable & Lightweight Suitable for Indoor/Outdoor entertainment, Digital Keystone Correction

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: 5G WiFi, USB, Bluetooth, Built-in Speaker, Portable & Lightweight Suitable for Indoor/Outdoor entertainment, Digital Keystone Correction See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Big-Screen Fun for Everyone With PVO Mini Projector, you can enjoy movies, TV shows, and games on a screen up to 170 inches - perfect for family movie nights, outdoor parties, and more!Keep your little ones entertained and protect their eyes from harmful screens with this must-have gadget for kids. They'll love watching their favorite cartoons and videos on the big screen!Our upgraded 2023 model supports 1080P full HD and has a natural resolution of 1920*1080, making the picture clearer and more comfortable to watch. (Best viewed in a dark room.)

50"- 150" Tailor-Made Projection Screen Easy Use: Just connect the power supply, turn on the projector, and then you can cast the screen to the wall or the projection screen (the screen accessories are not included) Easily Portable: The mini projector is very portable, you can travel with it everywhere, the product size is only 4.5*4.5*6 inches, the weight is 1.6 pounds, easy to carry Wireless projection and viewing and built-in viewing software: The projector can cast movies on the software in the form of WIFI and Bluetooth, but not in the form of HDMI (in order to reduce the size of the product and increase portability)

Native 1080P full HD projector delivers movies, video games, sports, and more to life in a stunning viewing experience with crystal clear images. Build-in stereo surround speaker, 1080p hd projector restored every detail sound effect to let you enjoy the pleasure sounds in different scenes. With Bluetooth, you can connect your ideal Bluetooth speaker wirelessly at any time. One-button start: only one click is required to start the machine Portable Design, Lightweight Design HDMI plug not included
Comes with tripod Support various angles to adjust the viewing angle of the projector, allowing frontal projection on the desktop, or projection of movies at oblique angles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY
reviews.reviewText: it worked once wonderfully, the next time I used it it didn’t sync to my phone, wifi or hotspot. My friend tried rebooting it via the menu that it provides and it now just doesn’t work. It will only turn on and show the “Oudisstech” but it won’t turn off unless I unplug it from the wall. Literally doesn’t even show the menu or anything. Waste of my money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like the description
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this product. I don’t have one complaint about the quality. I would definitely recommend this affordable and awesome projector. I am very pleased with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Was not able to sync to device at first- UPDATE
reviews.reviewText: ***UPDATE***After having no luck for about a week I forgot about the projector and then tried it again (its now about three weeks later) and it paired with laptop and phone. So, the thing actually pairs but it was frustrating getting a video to stream. This was a little slow and confusing for me. Changing my one star to three. The device is small and convenient but one star off because I'd like to take it outside but don't have an outlet for plug in and another star off because of how frustrating it was to get this started.This had an incredibly hard set up. It would not sync with my laptop and the instructions just seemed a little off. The wording seemed hard to follow.I liked the portable-ness of the device but did not like that it needed to be plugged in. I wanted to set this up in the part of my backyard that does not have an outlet so that won’t be possible. Would be great if this could be truly portable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Came sick. Once I digures out Hoe to run it it runs great. Just hard to get running
reviews.reviewText: Came quick. Once I figurds out Hoew to work it it to set up runs great. Just hard to get

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Could not stream video through nobile device
reviews.reviewText: Love the projector with built in youtube, netflix etc applications but was not able to stream video with mobile phone mirror feature. Quality is good but would have been great if video streaming through worked. Gets frustrating to search videos using the remote.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Muy bueno lo recomiendo y buena resolución

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t Sync to Devices
reviews.reviewText: We had to return it because it would not play videos from our devices. 3 people tried for a total of 5 hours to get it to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worked for two months and 1 day.
reviews.reviewText: Out of nowhere while watching, the screen had lines when colors come up on the screen. Not worth the money. So bad you get a headache from the lines if you try to watch anyways.
